title: Hint
text:
$$1$$. Given the confidence interval $$(67.18$$, $$68.82)$$, note that a confidence interval is centered at the sample mean when dealing with symmetrical intervals.

$$2$$. To find the center (the sample mean), take the average of the lower and upper bounds:
$$(67.18$$ + $$68.82)$$ ÷ $$2$$ $$=$$ $$136.00$$ ÷ $$2$$ $$=$$ $$68$$.
...
